description: Try our easy to follow Chargrilled Chicken with Fresh Pineapple & Red Onion recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chargrilled Chicken with Fresh Pineapple & Red Onion
name: Chargrilled Chicken with Fresh Pineapple & Red Onion Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, heat oil on a hotplate. Add onion wedges and cook, stirring often until golden and tender. Layer chicken, pineapple and onion onto plates, repeating layers. Drizzle with a little extra dressing. Serve with salad.
